name: Camilla: Getaway from the magical world
name_original: Camilla: Getaway from the magical world
description: This is a project made for college, the main objective was to make a redesign of a old game, we used the game Scramble as a base to make this one. If you want to test it just open "Aula.exe" and should be fine. This was a project made in the 2nd semester with my group and I'm still working on making a full portfolio for past and future projects.
